nodes.text: A Mind Flayer was an entity that was supposedly utilized by the Galactic Empire. Several years after the fall of the Empire, while trapped in a cantina on the planet Nevarro by the forces of former Imperial Moff Gideon, the former Rebel Alliance shock trooper Cara Dune believed that she would be uploaded to a Mind Flayer if she surrendered. Greef Karga, agent of the Bounty Hunters' Guild, denied that Mind Flayers existed, believing them to be wartime propaganda, but Dune was not willing to find out whether he was correct.
